question: Which country has become the first country to open an honorary consulate office in Gujarat International Finance Tec-City (GIFT City)?
explanation: Belgium has become the first country to open an honorary consulate office in Gujarat International Finance Tec-City (GIFT City). The consulate was inaugurated by Belgian Secretary of State for Foreign Trade, Pieter De Crem, at an event where Ajay Pandey, Managing Director and Group CEO, GIFT City.
